snippet.title: Crossing The Sands - Pre-Release Gameplay Demo
snippet.description:
A pre-release gameplay demo of the Crossing The Sands retro-style dungeon crawler (DRPG) recorded in October 2023. Watch the party explore the world and fight monsters in this retro-style RPG in the vein of The Bard's Tale, Wizardry, and Might and Magic. The game is currently available on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2505100/Crossing_The_Sands

Crossing The Sands is a standalone sequel to Into The Inferno. You do not need to have played Inferno in order to fully enjoy this game.

Game soundtrack by Bloodless Mushroom.
